name: RD52
description:
A very short action game about a robot killing wildlife and collecting metal parts. Made for the GameBoy Jam 2015.

Controls

WASD - Move
K - Shoot
J - Check
Space - Menu
Might support xbox360 controller

NotesThe game is short, and unpolished. I can see some potential in it, and might get back to it someday. This was done very quickly, in about a week or so, and I was pretty much done with it after the gbjam4 ended.

The menu has some options that do nothing. I wanted to implement more RPG elements and an Inventory system where you could gather items and keys, but I run out of time! :-/

Is it too hard?

Probably as I didn't playtest it much. What do you think?

Contact me on twitter @jondmt
